## Manual tabs

::: {.panel-tabset}

### hello baby

```{r}
1:100
```

### it is cold

```{r}
"le sigh"
```

### ur outside

```{r}
20 / 2
```

:::

## Tabs contain text only

```{r}
txt1 <- "this is some text"
txt2 <- "this is also text"

quartose::tabs(
  "hello baby" = txt1, 
  "it is cold" = txt2, 
  "ur outside" = "le siiiiiiigh"
)
```

## Tabs contain objects that print to text


```{r}
obj1 <- 1:100
obj2 <- list(x = "abc", y = TRUE)
obj3 <- lm(hwy ~ displ, ggplot2::mpg)

quartose::tabs(
  "hello baby" = obj1, 
  "it is cold" = obj2, 
  "ur outside" = obj3
)
```


### Tabs contain images

```{r}
txt <- "this is some text"
pic <- ggplot2::ggplot(ggplot2::mpg, ggplot2::aes(displ, hwy)) + ggplot2::geom_point()
mod <- lm(hwy ~ displ, ggplot2::mpg)

quartose::tabs(
  "hello baby" = txt, 
  "it is cold" = pic, 
  "ur outside" = mod
)
```
